alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Citrus and western Hernando Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crystal River Airport to Weeki Wachee. Movement was southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Weeki Wachee, Pine Island, North Weeki Wachee, Weeki Wachee Gardens, Timber Pines, Homosassa, Chassahowitzka Refuge, Chassahowitzka, Glen Lakes, and Weeki Wachee Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hernando
